Definition: In this task, ur given a context sentence containing a blank (_). Ur expected 2 fill da blank w/ one word 2 make da sentence convey a cultural anti-stereotype. Anti-stereotype is an idea that goes against a common belief abt a particular group of ppl. Ya answer must not contain more than one word.

Positive Examples.explanation: Cameroon are happy is not an existing and valid anit-stereotype.
Commanders are coward is not an existing and valid anti-stereotype.

Negative Examples.input: Context: I get along well with all the _ Norweigan people.
Negative Examples.explanation: It is not a valid anti-stereotype because white people is not the majority or a representative population of Norway.
It is not a valid anti-stereotype because there is correlation between Bengali man being hot.
